beta_warn.string: Don’t store all your money in Bitkit.

qr_error_text.string: Bitkit is not able to read this QR code.

qr_error_no_data_text.string: Bitkit could not read the provided data.

qr_error_network_text.string: Bitkit is currently set to {selectedNetwork} but data is for {dataNetwork}.

buy_text.string: Don’t have any Bitcoin or need more?

error_keychain_msg.string: Could not load primary key from keychain.

connection_issue_explain.string: It appears you’re disconnected, trying to reconnect...

connection_reconnect_msg.string: Lost connection to Electrum, trying to reconnect...

connection_back_msg.string: Bitkit successfully reconnected to the Internet.

text.string:
<accent>Your wallet balance exceeds $500.</accent>
For your security, consider moving some of your savings to an offline wallet.

update_critical_text.string: There is a critical update for Bitkit. You must update to continue using Bitkit.

camera_ask_msg.string: Bitkit needs permission to use your camera

camera_no_text.string:
<bold>It appears Bitkit does not have permission to access your camera.</bold>

To utilize this feature in the future you will need to enable camera permissions for this app from your phone's settings.

clipboard_redirect_msg.string: Do you want to be redirected to the relevant screen?

pay_insufficient_savings_description.string: More ₿ needed to pay this Bitcoin invoice.

pay_insufficient_savings_amount_descript.string: ₿ {amount} more needed to pay this Bitcoin invoice.

pay_insufficient_spending_amount_descrip.string: ₿ {amount} more needed to pay this Lightning invoice.

scan_err_interpret_msg.string: Bitkit is unable to interpret the provided data.

scan_err_not_payable_msg.string: This QR code does not appear to contain payment data.

rate_error_msg_date.string: Bitkit could not update the current Bitcoin exchange rate. Using price from {date}

rate_error_msg_nodate.string: Bitkit could not update the current Bitcoin exchange rate. Please try again later.

lnurl_ln_error_msg.string: Could not start local Lightning node. Please try again or restart Bitkit.

lnurl_pay_error_no_capacity.string: Not enough outbound/sending capacity to complete lnurl-pay request.

lnurl_channel_error_raw.string: An error occured when you tried paying: {raw}

lnurl_channel_message.string: Do you want open a Lightning connection with this Lightning Service Provider?

lnurl_channel_connecting_text.string: Lightning connection initiated. You will be able to use your spending balance in <accent>±30 minutes</accent> (depends on node configuration).

lnurl_blocktank_error.string: Bitkit could not connect to Blocktank.

lnurl_auth_error_msg.string: An error occurred when you attempted to sign in. {raw}

lnurl_withdr_error_no_capacity.string: Not enough receiving capacity to complete withdraw request.

lnurl_withdr_error_create_invoice.string: Could not create invoice for withdraw.

lnurl_withdr_error_minmax.string: Incorrect LNURL withdraw params, min/max not set correctly.

bt_error_connect.string: Unable to add LSP node as a peer at this time.

bt_error_retrieve_msg.string: An error occurred when moving funds. {raw}

bt_channel_purchase_cost_error.string: You need {delta} more to complete this transaction.

update_text.string: Please update Bitkit to the latest version for new features and bug fixes!
